Mcasp_SerializerStatus Mcasp_Object_s::serStatus[Mcasp_NUMSERIALIZERS]

Holds status information for both the serializers. *

  • Valid values are FREE, XMT and RCV SWI object for the swi used to handle the FIFO not empty while the * last packet callback is in progress
